StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: As you move around the Treasure Chest Stage area, your eyes spot a beautiful Goth stripper making her act on stage. She seems to be whispering something, as you approach, she grabs you around the neck and whispers some gibberish in you ear. After some hard thinking, you realize she just gave you the magic words to make others like her.
StaticSkill.Description: Created by the hand of a Goth girl who was sick of been laugh at for being different. Unfortunately for her, she misspelled some of the words and it had some nasty, or some should say interesting, side effects. The spell as being passed on since them. It is now used to turn people into eager Goth Bimbo who have an aversion to clothing's and a insatiable libido.
